Title: Prohibits the purchase of more than 1 firearm during any period of 30 days and implements a 10-day waiting period
Summary: Establishes the class A misdemeanor of unlawful procurement of a firearm, for the purchase or acquisition of more than 1 firearm during any period of 30 days; implements a 10-day waiting period.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to the unlawful procurement of a firearm; to amend the general business law, in relation to establishing a waiting period for the purchase of a firearm; and to amend the penal law, in relation to requiring licensed firearms businesses to report the crime of criminal purchase of a weapon and requiring background checks for employees who would be authorized to possess or transfer firearms
